name: coin-case
effect: Contains the Coins used by the Game Corner, to a maximum of 50,000.
short_effect: Holds coins for the Game Corner.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: A case that holds up to 9,999 COINS.
flavor_text.emerald: A case that holds up to 9,999 COINS.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A case for holding COINS obtained at the GAME CORNER. It holds up to 9,999 COINS.
